Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2009 07:37PM survivor6years wrote:  Hang in there liz I had a mastectomy in 2002. I'm fine and its been almost 7 years on Feb 3. My mother also died from BC and my sister as well. I'm 60 now and plan to live to be 100. Dying  of cancer is not a option. I'm dying of old age. Positive attitude is very important. Good luck to you.
